job.title: Staff Software Engineer - Golang / AWS - Enterprise SaaS
job.description: If you are a SeniortoStaff level Software Engineer with proven experience building cloudbased Enterprise SaaS products at scale please read onbrbrstrongThis is a fulltimepermanent position directhire with my client This is also a 100 REMOTE positionbrbrstrongWe are a leading cloudnative data protection SaaS company hiring for highimpact roles in our Engineering group reporting to our CoFounderVP of EngineeringbrbrWe are a postSeries C stage startup with significant revenue with 200M in funding and are growing steadily hiring a remotefirst workforcebrbrTop Reasons to Work with UsbrbrWe have an incredible company culture which is collaborative supportive focuses on helping teammates grow their careers and with complete transparency from the CSuite to the entire companybrbrSolve Enterprisescale engineering challenges processing metabytes of databrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrDesign and implement software components from the groundup on a distributed cloudscale SaaS platform in a microservicebased architecturebrbrUse public cloud technologies to solve hard problems with a securityfirst mindset to build high throughput scalable data ingestion and processing pipelinesbrbrWork closely with product management and crossfunctional teams such as UX UI and QE and Customer Success to deliver and maintain features and projects in a continuous integration and deployment mannerbrbrAnalyze and monitor metrics to construct benchmarks and iterate towards optimal performance while keeping focus on costefficient usage of cloud resourcesbrbrWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrProven experience designing implementing and supporting largescale cloud servicesbrulli Golanglili AWSlili Microserviceslili Back Endlili Kuberneteslili Enterprise SaaSlili Clili
